name: dnetwo.bot
author: dnetwo

sections.description:
dnetwo.bot plugin is the easiest way to add a chat pop-up to your site. Let dnetwo.bot answer the incoming queries, allowing your support team to focus on the essentials and complex queries.

dnetwo.bot wordpress plugin is powered by IOX LAB and allows smooth integration of chatbot with your website.

Make a Chatbot in 30 seconds

Nobody has ever made chatbot making as easy as dnetwo.bot. plugin. Using the simple bot management system, you can design a chatbot in 30 seconds.

Happy customers

Your customers get quick and 24/7 information and help. Gain insights into their behaviour and find out what they want. This way everyone stays happy.

Key features

  • Create bots easily without prior knowledge in programming
  • Design each bot individually
  • Data protection – Data is hosted on secure SSL encrypted connections & servers in Germany
  • Analytics – Get in-depth metrics about your customers and learn what they need
  • Customer data – Capture customer data such as names, numbers & addresses by text field
  • Calendar – schedule appointment with customers via the calendar function
  • Multimedia – Include images, videos and links in your chatbots
  • Flexible options for upgrade to Lite, Basic, Pro and Enterprise versions

The Demo version is free for 30 days! During this period, you can create and test chatbots. Additional frees are applied after the trial period. Check out our pricing plans here
sections.installation:
Copy-Paste to Install

To install dnetwo.bot plugin on your website, all you must do is to copy and paste the Client ID and Security Key in General tab. It is a one-time process.

Installation

  1. Login to your WordPress Admin (E.g. http://yourWordpressWebsite/wp-admin/). Select Plugins. Click on Add New option.
  2. Search for dnetwo.bot, install and activate
  3. Register through registration tab and deploy the bot
  4. Copy the Client ID and Security Key to dnetwo.bot > general > Customer ID and Security Key
sections.changelog:
